news.title: Ex-RWA of Chintels Paradiso told to share complaints on construction quality
news.para: In an interaction with the probe panel formed by deputy commissioner Nishant Yadav, the residents of Tower D had pointed out that they had lodged multiple complaints with the then RWA about construction quality in their flats.

news.title: Noida: Supertech twin towers to be gone in nine seconds
news.para: Coincidentally, the nine-second demolition is nine months from the August 31, 2021 order of the Supreme Court for the two Supertech buildings – Apex and Ceyane – to be razed to the ground.

news.title: Four banks come on board to infuse funds into Amrapali housing projects
news.para: Six banks---Bank of Baroda, Punjab National Bank, Bank of India, State Bank of India, UCO Bank and Punjab & Sindh Bank--had agreed way back in November to infuse money in Amrapali’s projects but they have been dithering in taking a final decision in the last four months.

news.title: ED attached wrong properties of ex-director of Amrapali Group: Forensic auditor to SC
news.para: ​A bench of Justices UU Lalit and Bela M Trivedi was told by forensic auditor Pawan Agarwala that what ED is claiming to be the properties of Amrapali Group's former director Prem Mishra as proceeds of crime was actually the properties of Amrapali Modern Homes Pvt Ltd, which has been constructed by siphoning of home buyers money.

news.title: Sebi levies Rs 7 lakh fine on Jaypee Infratech for disclosure lapses
news.para: The company did not make disclosures with regard to series of non-convertible debt (NCD) securities issued and listed by it, as required under market norms, a Sebi order said.

news.title: Government brings clarity in policy for FDI in real estate business
news.para: According to the Press Note of the Department for Promotion of Industry and Internal Trade (DPIIT) released on Monday, it is clarified that FDI is not permitted in an entity which is engaged or proposes to engage in real estate business, construction of farm houses and trading in transferable development rights.

news.title: Ahmedabad: Illegal structures double in four years in heritage zones
news.para: Between 2011 and May 2021, the core heritage zone of the AMC, which includes Khadia 1, Khadia 2, Shahibaugh, Shahpur, Jamalpur and Dariapur, saw 2,057 illegal buildings.

news.title: Godrej, DLF and Oberoi raise home prices on strong demand, input cost hike
news.para: Top developers including Godrej, DLF, Sobha, Oberoi, Lodha, and Mahindra have increased prices quarter on quarter, an analysis of their earning calls after their third quarter results showed. They claimed the price hike has not impacted sales.

news.title: Income Tax department searches Omaxe group premises in NCR, others
news.para: ​At least 30 locations in Delhi-NCR and few others in Uttar Pradesh and Punjab are being covered where the tax department officers are looking at company documents and financial transactions primarily related to their real estate business, they said.

news.title: Quepem civic body issues documents to regularise structure in NDZ
news.para: QMC chief officer Madhu Narvekar allegedly issued a house number to one structure and also a no-objection certificate to the electricity department for a connection.

news.title: DLF to invest Rs 550 crore to construct 1-million-sq ft office in Chennai for Standard Chartered
news.para: Chennai, Mar 14 (PTI) Realty major DLF on Monday announced an investment of around Rs 550 crore to construct a one-million-square-feet office building for Standard Chartered Global Business Services' largest campus globally.

news.title: Nagpur: Notices issued to raze houses along Nag River and nullahs
news.para: The district administration’s nazul department has served demolition notices for over 30 houses located along nullah at Mariam Nagar in West Nagpur a couple of days ago.

news.title: Over 300 plot owners remain homeless due to Nagpur Improvement Trust apathy
news.para: TOI on January 1, 2021 reported the plight of 317 plots owners who are made to run from pillar to post for over five years now to build own houses on their plots after NIT constructed an overhead water tank and road on part of some plots assuming it to be public utility (PU) land.

news.title: Rajasthan: Action ordered against officials for incorrect info in PMAY-G
news.para: According to the centre, the names were rejected due to wrong information uploaded on the system. It was also directed to conduct a re-examination of all the beneficiaries who were rejected by the centre’s portal.

news.title: Indore: Buying dream house will cost you 20% more now
news.para: Developers said that in Indore, the average cost of building a residential and commercial property has increased from Rs 1,300 sq ft to Rs 2,500 sq ft.
